oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Memphi Invitation
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mardi Gras; Mystic Memphi;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An invitation with the Memphi coat of arms printed in the middle. Tan invitation in the form of a pentagon with the two longer sides being 6 in. and the three short sides being 4 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
